q_ch: 产品类型是Dress的缝纫任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the sewing tasks for Dress's product type?

steps.sql: SELECT st.* FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: To find the sewing tasks for products of type 'Dress', we need to join the sewing_tasks table with the order_product, products, and products_types tables to filter the tasks related to the 'Dress' product type.

response:
Sure thing! Here are the sewing tasks for products of type 'Dress' that we found:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status   |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|----------|
| 14      | 2024-03-18          | 2024-04-08          | 2                | 120            | 120              | Complete 😄 |
| 13      | 2024-03-27          | 2024-04-06          | 2                | 130            | 120              | Complete 😄 |
| 11      | 2024-03-21          | 2024-04-14          | 9                | 140            | 100              | In Progress 🔄 |
| 12      | 2024-03-27          | 2024-04-12          | 2                | 150            | 120              | Complete 😄 |

Feel free to ask if you need more details or have any other questions! 😊
